name: Vision Anchor
description: VisionAnchor has developed the world's first smart anchoring system that actually tracks the anchor and sends a data feed to the boat. This makes anchoring faster and safer saving the owners hundreds of thousands of USD in damages or fines.
one_liner: VisionAnchor has developed the world's first smart anchoring system that actually tracks the anchor and sends a data feed to the boat. This makes anchoring faster and safer saving the owners hundreds of thousands of USD in damages or fines.
